page.description: The default size for SVG icons in a component that does not use the Alpha or Alpha-based Web Themes.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Default size for SVG icons]* defines the default width and height for SVG icons in pixels. The size is specified using the format *[em:width,height]*. For example, to define a default size of 40 pixels by 80 pixels, you would enter the following in the *[ui:Default size for SVG icons]* property:
This property is only shown when you select a web theme that is not based on the Alpha web theme.

see.ref: Default size for SVG icons (Grid Component)
